Body:
Anyone can tell me the different ways or things through which we can identify the IOT devices?

Like we can identify the IOT device through IP address , mac address, and headers in this way what else things are through which an IOT device can be identified..??

For any gud sugestion i will be very thankfull to you....

General speaking, you should always be able to get the API from devices' suppliers.

IoT devices may use different ways to transmit data, such as BLE, Wi-Fi, LTE and so on. Each protocol has their own way to define an unique ID of the device. For example, some of them may contain the MAC address in the header, or some may contain the unique ID in the data.

Getting API from devices' suppliers is good way. Sometimes it is not enough to get API because we have to handle non-API requirement or so many protocols which are not well defined.

Interactor(www.interactor.com) is worth to check it and this solution might be good to check it too
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BmDVbgm2Oa4 We can interact with things without coding
column9:
only through simple configurations just like router did.

There are a few pain points that we can meet when we need to handle IoT things. There are so many devices in IoT(Imagine the street that we are walking on). Many of them have different protocols and data types. Some of them might be out of production. I think this is the real problem for IoT. No matter how many companies released new IoT devices
column10:
we need to integrate all things on street with all things.

"
